pageContext.claim: “For a team of 29 people with AK27s, or whatever they were using, to charge a house like they did [to arrest Roger Stone] at six in the morning, I think that was a very sad thing for this country.”
pageContext.analysis: Stone claimed 29 agents showed up to arrest him, but officials have not confirmed that number. There's no such thing as an AK-27. Trump may have been referring to the AK-47, but FBI agents, although they were heavily armed for this raid, do not carry Russian rifles.
